TopicTitle: Help, game crashes to desktop very often.

Articles.Content:
Hi, im running version 1.8.1 with RSS/RO/RP1 and im having a lot of problems lately, the game crashes a lot when loading into structures or when getting in or out a flight, i copy pasted the crash log from the player log and im going to post it here .

Crash!!!
SymInit: Symbol-SearchPath: '.;D:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program;D:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space 

[moderator snip]

========== END OF STACKTRACE ===========

A crash has been intercepted by the crash handler. For call stack and other details, see the latest crash report generated in:
 * C:/Users/matte_agftcyi/AppData/Local/Temp/Squad/Kerbal Space Program/Crashes
 

Edited November 7, 2020 by Vanamonde

Hi... Welcome to the forums :wave:

But you should go back and edit your post to remove the text of your log, its kinda frowned on.

But to point you in a direction on how/where to get started, try reading the first post of this thread:

Then come back with links to your logs, and I'm sure someone can help you get it figured out.

Edited November 7, 2020 by Stone Blue

Welcome to the forum, @GutwPC. I'm sorry but we've had to remove your log since posts that large tend to cause page loading problems. Please upload it to a file sharing service and copy the link they provide into your post here. And good luck with your issue.
uh, i restarted the game and it didnt crash for quite some time so idk....
